pullRequest.title: Using yaml as config file instead of toml
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move teku configuration file format to yaml from toml
Use PicoCLI "2-pass approach" to obtain config file
Fallback to TEKU_CONFIG_FILE environment variable if configuration file is not specified on command line
Don't use default config file path of ./config/config.yaml
Updated PicoCLI parameter exception handler for better error reporting
Manual validation of scripts/*.sh

Issue #1541
Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem usman@usmans.info
